twoicps.desc: width of the analysis window-of-interest specified in cycle-per-sample (i.e. decreasing with frequencies of interest)

method.desc: methods of calculating the cross-spectral relationship

chanphase.desc: cell-array with selection of channels for the phase providing channels, if empty all channels will be used and chanamp will be ignored (i.e. within-channel CFA)

chanamp.desc: cell-array with selection of channels for the amplitude providing channels, if empty chanphase will be used (i.e. within-channel CFA)

foiphase.desc: frequencies of interest specified as [1xN1] for phase providing (low) FOIs

foiamp.desc: frequencies of interest specified as [1xN2] for amplitude providing (high) FOIs

nphasebins.desc: number of of bins within the 2 pi phase range to calculate PAC (for method='pac' only)

weightedaveraging.desc: weight data with trial number when averaging

ignorebefore.desc: ignore trials before this one, negative number means for each trialtype

ignoreafter.desc: ignore trials after this one, negative number means for each trialtype

snapshottwoi.desc: timewindow-of-interest for snapshots specified as [start stop] in milliseconds (or as Nx2 matrix)
